channel.title: FroyoScape's Elemental Swords - AMY + FROYOSCAPE = EPIC - Drafting boss!
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt][tt]FroyoScape's[/tt] Elemental Swords[/size][/center]
[center][img]https://fbcdn-sphotos-h-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-prn1/v/521633_300383386750605_2065165258_n.jpg?oh=c0b53187a4bbfc35e898c80d79d5325a&oe=510F72A8&__gda__=1360003721_e5a8d35c73f73b942b232db75e38f455[/img][/center] [center][size=5pt](Planned way the boss will look like)[/size][/center] Well me and Amy have been working on ReUni, a minigame for FroyoScape. We got the idea of there being a beast that has a sword and a shield. The shield will be randomized. Electric, Water, and Fire is what has been thought. The player must utilize the weapon they get or use magic to defeat this enemy. Here is the following chart for the supper effectiveness of the weapons to shield:
Layout: SHIELD <- Weapon/mage style
Legend: Not effective Neutral Super effective
Electric <- Earth Electric <- Fire Electric <- Ice Electric <- Electric
Earth <- Water Earth <- Ice Earth <- Electric Earth <- Fire
Fire <- Earth Fire <- Electric Fire <- Fire Fire <- Ice
[img]http://sphotos-h.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-prn1/v/549943_299865150135762_589433189_n.jpg?oh=edddaac0dce753a69d40a739ceeac73f&oe=510EC6C0&__gda__=1359987825_eb676ff8eef2aeba52552324ad5fa2a6[/img] [IMG]http://img836.imageshack.us/img836/3844/swordfz.png[/img] [img]https://fbcdn-sphotos-h-a.akamaihd.net/hphotos-ak-prn1/v/644177_300383366750607_1875113638_n.jpg?oh=dcc235f82a02a7e20a99e45111c1f13c&oe=510F6470&__gda__=1360004049_51c6bd05b5ec148c33054a4944471e5e[/img]
Please give us your opinions!
-The FroyoScape Team

item.title: FroyoScape's Elemental Swords - AMY + FROYOSCAPE = EPIC - Drafting boss!
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“poopler40, post:21, topic:481188”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=599426.msg4215014#msg4215014 date=1360122544]

Then I’m going to make an application for animation right now.

what do you mean?
[/quote]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,599713.0.html

is amy still with you?[/quote]
Of course.

Read full topic

item.title: FroyoScape's Elemental Swords - AMY + FROYOSCAPE = EPIC - Drafting boss!
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[center][size=24pt][tt]FroyoScape’s[/tt] Elemental Swords[/size][/center]

[center][/center]
[center][size=5pt](Planned way the boss will look like)[/size][/center]
Well me and Amy have been working on ReUni, a minigame for FroyoScape. We got the idea of there being a beast that has a sword and a shield. The shield will be randomized. Electric, Water, and Fire is what has been thought. The player must utilize the weapon they get or use magic to defeat this enemy. Here is the following chart for the supper effectiveness of the weapons to shield:

Layout:
SHIELD <- Weapon/mage style

Legend:
Not effective
Neutral
Super effective

Electric <- Earth
Electric <- Fire
Electric <- Ice
Electric <- Electric

Earth <- Water
Earth <- Ice
Earth <- Electric
Earth <- Fire

Fire <- Earth
Fire <- Electric
Fire <- Fire
Fire <- Ice



Please give us your opinions!

-The FroyoScape Team

Read full topic
item.source: FroyoScape's Elemental Swords - AMY + FROYOSCAPE = EPIC - Drafting boss!
